name: Chef Fat to Fit World Dash - cool run jump-ing & diner cooking games for kids!
name_original: Chef Fat to Fit World Dash - cool run jump-ing & diner cooking games for kids!
description:
Can you get these overweight Chefs to lose weight and get in shape? They are spending too much time in the kitchen, and they need your help!

To lose weight fast, they are going to need you to help them workout, watch their nutrition, and more!

Watch what they eat, exercise 20x a day, and make sure they hit the weight room!!!

Once one chef hits the weight goal, move onto other fun characters in the kitchen!!

Run on the treadmill, jump rope, box, lift weights, and much more to get fit fast!
